alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Cortland; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 10:32PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Otsego, east central Cortland and northern Chenango Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1032 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cincinnatus, or 12 miles northeast of Marathon, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Norwich, Plymouth, North Norwich, Oxford, Sherburne, Cincinnatus, Preston, Willet, Pitcher and Pharsalia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
